message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high. How about we meet halfway at $11,750?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
